title: Exploiting XSS in hidden inputs and meta tags
summary: In this post we are going to show how you can (ab)use the new HTML popup functionality in Chrome to exploit XSS in meta tags and hidden inputs.

title: PyLoose: Python-based fileless malware targets cloud workloads to deliver cryptominer
summary: PyLoose is a newly discovered Python-based fileless malware targeting cloud workloads.
